title: Pre-Hearing Analysis with Rachel Maddow, Joy Reid, and Nicolle Wallace (Hearing #8, 7/21/22)
description: Rachel Maddow, Joy Reid, and Nicolle Wallace along with a range of expert guests preview the eighth in a series of public hearings by the Select Committee to Investigate the January 6th Attack on the United States Capitol to share the findings of their investigation.
author: multimedia@msnbc.com (MSNBC)
content:encoded: Rachel Maddow, Joy Reid, and Nicolle Wallace along with a range of expert guests preview the eighth in a series of public hearings by the Select Committee to Investigate the January 6th Attack on the United States Capitol to share the findings of their investigation.
